Author: soontobepetite
Text: yeah im aware that fasting is making it worse but every time i gain weight after a binge i feel like i dont deserve any food, just iced coffee and water at best.

Author: tseokii
Text: it sounds like trying to fast is making your binge urges worse. try to not beat yourself up, it's probably just your body reacting to starvation. take it easy and try to eat at maintenance and there's a good chance the binge urges will subside
